title: Katie Price films with Kris Boyson in Dublin after reunion
text:
Katie is currently filming scenes for her reality show (Picture: Splash News)

Katie Price and Kris Boyson were seen out and about in Dublin alongside Katie’s youngest children – after the two seemingly got back together.

The 41-year-old was in the Irish city to film scenes for her reality series, My Crazy Life, and made sure to bring the whole gang with her.

And she and Kris looked pretty comfortable in their matching all-black getup, with Katie opting for a cosy jumper, while Kris wore a pair of black boots.

Katie also added a touch of colour to her outfit, opting to wear a rather daring choice of nude, ankle-heeled boots. Talk about stylish.

The former glamour model was seen alongside her two youngest children, six-year-old Jett and five-year-old Bunny, who she shares with ex-husband Kieran Hayler.

Katie and Kris are said to be ‘officially back on’ after the two had previously called off their engagement.

‘They’re officially back on,’ a source shared to The Sun. ‘Everyone’s shocked that he didn’t make it harder for her, but they’re back to being loved-up again like they never split.’

Katie pretty much confirmed that they were back together after she shared a picture of Kris alongside daughter Bunny, as well as a shot of the two together with Katie’s 14-year-old son Junior, who she shares with ex-husband Peter Andre.

Katie wore an all-black getup (Picture: Splash News)

The couple had previously got engaged in July, before calling it off just weeks later.

During their breakup, Katie had a fling with 22-year-old builder Charles Drury, amid reports that she had cheated on Kris with him.

Katie wore a daring set of shoes with her outfit (Picture: Splash News)

Things did not last long between Katie and Charles – with the builder reportedly dumping her for sneaking around with Kris.

‘She lied to Charles,’ an insider previously told Metro.co.uk. ‘Katie was totally caught out.

Katie and Kris were previously said to be ‘officially back on’ (Picture: Splash News)

‘She’s in hot water, they’ve been sneaking behind people’s back and it’s not cool.’

Charles later claimed he felt ‘mugged off’ by the mum-of-five, and slammed her antics in the bedroom, branding her a ‘one out of ten’.

‘For any lad it’s like a dream come true, but it wasn’t anything to brag about to my mates,’ he said to The Sun.

‘I thought it was going to be better than what I expected. I was disappointed.’
